resources.string: The n queens puzzle is the problem of placing n chess queens on an n√ón chessboard so that no two queens threaten each other. Thus, a solution requires that no two queens share the same row, column, or diagonal.Its solution exist for all natural numbers n with the exception of n=2 and n=3.
In this game you are provided with different levels where you can solve this problem.Try to complete the levels in minimum time and boast about it through leaderboard.
This is the place where you can see players who have completed different levels from all around the world and can compare their timings with you own.
